sourcesContent:
<template>
	<v-container flat>
		<v-row>
			<!-- <v-col cols="3"></v-col> -->
			<v-col cols="12">
				<v-card class="mx-auto" align="center">
					<v-container>
						<v-row>
							<v-col cols="4" v-for="item in forecasts" :key="item.text">
								<v-btn 
								rounded class="text-center" height="100" width="100">
									<v-list-item two-line>
      <v-list-item-content>
        <v-list-item-title class="info--text pa-2">
          <v-icon>{{item.icon}}</v-icon>
        </v-list-item-title>
        <v-list-item-subtitle class="primary--text">
          {{}}
        </v-list-item-subtitle>
      </v-list-item-content>
    </v-list-item>
								</v-btn>

							</v-col>
						</v-row>
					</v-container>
				</v-card>
			<!-- <v-col cols="3"></v-col> -->	
			</v-col>
		</v-row>
	</v-container>
</template>


<script>
  export default {
    data () {
      return {
        forecasts: [
          { text: 'Cash Out', icon: 'plus'},
          { text: 'Add Money', icon: 'minus'},
          { text: 'Send Money', icon: 'lock'},
          { text: 'Mobile Recharge', icon: 'right'},
        ],
      }
    },
  }
</script>
